org.xeustechnologies.jcl
Class JarClassLoader

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.ClassLoader
      org.xeustechnologies.jcl.AbstractClassLoader
          org.xeustechnologies.jcl.JarClassLoader

public class JarClassLoader
extends AbstractClassLoader

Reads the class bytes from jar files and other resources using ClasspathResources

Author:
Kamran Zafar
